pkgmetadata.longdescription: Rank and Social Hierarchy for Gregarious Animals // Tools developed to facilitate the establishment of the rank and social hierarchy for gregarious animals by the Si method developed by Kondo Hurnik (1990)doi:10.1016/0168-1591(90)90125-W. It is also possible to determine the number of agonistic interactions between two individuals, sociometric and dyadics matrix from dataset obtained through electronic bins.
